name: Make up and drive
description:
You are a young girl who dreams of becoming famous and acting in films. Now the casting will begin and you need to have time to get there and makeup!

Controls:
  • Space - to look in the mirror
  • Mouse - to look around and pick up items
  • WASD - to drive
Made by:
  • Vadim Kovtun
  • Vlad Pechen
  • Denis Rybakov
